an5.224:4.3: Āvāsamaccharī hoti, kulamaccharī hoti, lābhamaccharī hoti, vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, dhammamaccharī hoti.
an5.224:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā atinivāse.
an5.224:5.3: Na āvāsamaccharī hoti, na kulamaccharī hoti, na lābhamaccharī hoti, na vaṇṇamaccharī hoti, na dhammamaccharī hoti.
an5.224:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā samavatthavāse”ti.
